data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Yuen Long. Through your servants plant 106 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yuen Long, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Yuen Long, Hong Kong know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Yuen Long you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Yuen Long, Hong Kong. Show them that faithfulness is better than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Yuen Long to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, encourage the church of Yuen Long, Hong Kong that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Please, teach the 32,695 believers in Yuen Long, Hong Kong how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yuen Long, Hong Kong has a population of 534,200.

We estimate Yuen Long has 32,695 people who might know Jesus, 37,208 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 464,298 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
